backend/main.mo: Primary backend actor defining plan, enquiry, and user profile types plus create/update plan logic with access control and storage mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module transferring user profiles and plans from an older actor version while initializing enquiries and counters.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, related files, components, and test IDs for plan image handling and UI display.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files for reference or documentation.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions supporting light/dark mode and custom color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, title, viewport, and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app handling hashâ€‘based navigation between home and LIC Plans pages with shared layout components.
Marketing About section showing advisor values, experience, and reasons to choose their services.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Contac: Displays a contact section with advisor contact details and the ContactForm component.
Implements a validated enquiry form that submits user details via a mutation hook and shows toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/marketing/FAQ.ts: Renders an FAQ section using an accordion with predefined insurance-related questions and answers.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Footer: Provides footer branding, quick navigation links, contact info, and an LIC-related disclaimer.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Hero.t: Creates the landing hero section with headline, CTAs, trust indicators, and a main promotional image.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Navbar: Implements a responsive navigation bar with scroll-to-section behavior and mobile menu handling.
Renders a grid of predefined insurance plans with features and a scroll-to-contact button, highlighting the most popular plan.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Servic: Displays a list of insurance-related services with icons and descriptions, along with a supporting image section.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Testim: Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/plans/PlanPoster: Component that loads and displays a plan poster image with loading and error fallbacks.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor instance based on user identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, managing login flow, stored identities, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlans.ts: Contains hooks for fetching, creating, and updating plans via the backend actor, with error handling and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides a mutation hook to submit user enquiries to the backend and invalidates related queries on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, CSS variables for light/dark themes, and responsive utility styles including premium table formatting.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/LICPlans.tsx: Implements the LIC plans management page with admin actions, file uploads, OCR processing, and plan display controls.
frontend/src/utils/ocr.ts: Provides a simulated OCR pipeline with progress reporting and basic plan text parsing logic.
Handles filename normalization, plan title derivation, and scoring/grouping logic for matching uploaded files to plans.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for extracting, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/src/utils/validation.ts: Contains simple validation functions for required fields, email, and phone formats.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, shadows, animations, and plugins such as typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing features and requirements for attaching and displaying poster images for LIC plans, starting with Jeevan Utsav.
